caption.p: Pearson correlation analysis between lncRNAs and mRNAs. a– e The co-expression relationship between MIR4435-2HG and paired mRNAs (PLAU, LOX, COL5A1, VCAN and OSBPL3). f The ceRNA regulatory subnetwork of MIR4435-2HG. (G–H) The co-expression relationship between ELFN1-AS1 and paired mRNAs (SRM and E2F1). i The ceRNA regulatory subnetwork of ELFN1-AS1
